Rules.InvariantScript:
ClearCollect(filteredSites, 
Distinct(Filter('Site and warehouse (mserp)', 'Company Code' = Lower(selectedCompanyCode)), 
Site))

SortByColumns(
    Search(
        filteredSites,
        TextInput_SiteAndWarehouseSearch.Text,
        Value), 
    "Value", 
    SortOrder.Ascending)
